title: Potential Buffer Overflow in _tcscpy_s
description: _tcscpy_s is used to copy strings into a fixed-size buffer (args[256]). However, the size of the source string is not checked before copying, which could lead to a buffer overflow if the source string exceeds 255 characters.
fix: Use _tcsncpy_s instead of _tcscpy_s and ensure that the length of the source string does not exceed the destination buffer size.
